column1: Sometimes it's possible to pursue your dream with a huge head start. Fiji's Nanukulevu Island is just such an opportunity—12.5 acres of tropical beauty on leasehold land
column2: covered with coconut palms and surrounded by white-sand beaches and turquoise waters. It's the holiday paradise project of the current owners
column3: who for health reasons are not able to see their dream through
column4: and now hope that their hard work will pay off and someone else can live out the dream.
